name: AdventureOfBrush
description:
2d fast paced adventure-rpg  Inspired by dark souls , bloodborne etc.With unique art-style.

NOTE:This is demo(only tutorial area + boss)

BONUS:  Adventure of brush (Zero)-old project,2d platformer with unique art-style and unique mehanics

Link to web Game: https://aleksavelimirovic.itch.io/adventureofbrushweb

CONTROLS

A,D - MOVE

Space - jump

P-Attack

O-Dash

I - inventory

E - interact

ESC - menu
